verbs.description: The bar [V: is] set high for success . Trump must attain an unequivocal commitment from Kim to " complete , verifiable and irreversible " abandonment of his WMD programs .
[ARG1: The bar] is [V: set] [ARG2: high] [ARGM-PRP: for success] . Trump must attain an unequivocal commitment from Kim to " complete , verifiable and irreversible " abandonment of his WMD programs .
